Don't use   for just adding space.   is intended for other purpose.  If you justified the text, your paragraph might broke at unexpected places. E.g. if you have units in your para say '5 cm' and if the number '5' comes at the end of line and 'cm' goes to next line it doesn't make sense. In this case you should use "5 cm" so it will not allow "5 cm" to break. It will be at the end of line or both will go to next line.see this link for detailed explanation Butterick’s Practical Typography There are other ways to add space :Word spacing - to insert space between words,Letter spacing - to insert space between letters,line height - to insert space between lines in a paragraph,margin - insert space between any two sections or divs or what ever,padding - for adding space between inner content and it's border.text indent - to add space for the first line in a paragraph. You should use appropriate tool for appropriate purpose!
